episodes.title: SHUNNING HURTS - SCIENCE PROVES IT | #exjw #jehovahswitnesses #jehovah
episodes.description:
Welcome to this radio style show from an ex-Jehovah’s Witness for (but not exclusively) other ex-Jehovah’s Witnesses. But it's also for those struggling while inside.  It’s even for our brethren across the way -I’m looking at you Seventh Day Adventists and Latter-Day Saints (Mormons)

The Algorithm Gods Must Have Their Sacrifice!

episodes.title: The Watchdogs Of 1975 | #exjw #jehovahswitnesses #jehovah
episodes.description:
In 1975 the leadership of Jehovah's Witness, a prophet in deed if not in title by their own accounts, claimed 1975 would be the end of the world.  Let's take a trip by gaslight into this false messenger's mind and the cult it runs.

The Algorithm Gods Must Have Their Sacrifice!
